title: Episode 8: Bill on Science, Philosophy, Religion, Oh my!
description:
I talk with Bill about quantum physics, his exposure to science, philosophy and religion and how it helps him to navigate the wacky world we live in. 

I often talk about and with individuals from the Bridges of Meaning Discord. Here is a link if you're interested in checking it out! 

BOM Discord: https://discord.gg/nJaM7B6NBJ
